data.name: Super SpaceMail
data.detailed_description:
Hello, Potential Traveler!

We from BUBBLE DELIVERING ENTERPRISE are looking for a human JUST LIKE YOU to deliver letters in a specific dwarf Galaxy for some weird reason I won’t mention here...

This job may provide you with amazing experiences, such as:

Traveling through the universe
Meeting people around
Breaking things and collecting coins
Solving mysteries that we know nothing about
Playing pinball???
And more!

Feeling alone in the emptiness of space?

No more, because you’ll be accompanied by a living spaceship that will help you navigate through the galaxy using coordinates and having little breaks for snacks occasionally.

Don't know if the job is for you?

Fear not, because we provide a Mini Space Experience for free right now, so you can test everything and see if you have what It takes!

Other nice features:

  • An unexpected bass "battle"
  • Buy fuel
  • Use the fuel you bought
  • Be afraid of not having enough fuel to go back to buy more fuel
  • Be sucked into a black hole with no escape rote
  • Play pinball (I like pinball)

data.short_description: Super SpaceMail is an Adventure game about connections where you play as a mailman delivering letters in space, making friends, and solving a mystery way bigger than this universe.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Randeon Vega 8
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
